meanings.definition: Not created; existing without having been made
meanings.sent1: The uncreated painting seemed to appear out of nowhere.
meanings.sent2: The artist admired the uncreated masterpiece before him.
meanings.sent3: The uncreated story magically unfolded on the blank pages.
meanings.sent4: Her uncreated talent shone brighter than any other.
meanings.sent5: The uncreated melody echoed through the empty room.

meanings.definition: Not brought into existence by a creator
meanings.sent1: The uncreated universe puzzled scientists for centuries.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization believed in uncreated gods.
meanings.sent3: The uncreated sculpture appeared mysteriously in the park.
meanings.sent4: His uncreated theory challenged the traditional beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The uncreated myth captivated the minds of many.

meanings.definition: Eternal; existing outside of time and space
meanings.sent1: The uncreated being watched over the world silently.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of an uncreated realm beyond the stars.
meanings.sent3: The uncreated energy flowed through the ancient forest.
meanings.sent4: His uncreated wisdom guided generations to come.
meanings.sent5: The uncreated light illuminated the darkness around.
